des: "This zesty salad gets its name from the colorful diced veggies and the party  your taste buds will have when you try it! Try using yellow bell peppers instead of the red, if you like.  Serve on a bed of lettuce or crusty sourdough rolls."
ins: In a mixing bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, bell peppers, red onion, green onion, garlic, parsley, vinegar, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce and salt and pepper. Stir well and refrigerate for at least one hour.
